title: Laurel? Rosette with Eight Petals
description:
Golden laurel (?) rosette with eight petals.  Rosette has a central boss at the base.  The sleeve of each boss protrudes through the rear of the rosette.  On the rear are two tube eyelets.  Each petal curves concavely.
Condition:  Several petals and stamens bent; one eyelet missing; reddish-brown dirt.
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas S. Brush

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
